website_summaries.verdict: This cover boasts easy installation and hook-and-loop straps to help secure your TV.
pros: Easy set-up with hook-and-loop straps to secure cover to TV
Heavy-duty fabric protects against wind, rain, snow, UV, dust, mold, and mildew
Bottom panel secures for extra protection
cons: Some would prefer a zipper closure over VELCRO-type tape

customer_reviews.title: ... perfectly with just enough extra room to slide on easily. The inside liner material is soft and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a 43" diagonally measured Samsung TV and this fit perfectly with just enough extra room to slide on easily. The inside liner material is soft and this cover is very well made. For reference I purchased the 40-43" cover size.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs Up

customer_reviews.title: Fits as advertised. Like the remote control pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. Really helps keep TV and connections dry. Although under roof and in a screened porch. The humidity can be brutal especially in our southern coastal, salty air. With the remote control pocket, we always know where to find it!
customer_reviews.author: SPYC1

customer_reviews.title: Worked for awhile...
customer_reviews.text: I usd this product for the last few months and was very satisfied...until this last weekend. After a day of rain, I uncovered my TV and it was full of water. The water had entered through the seams on the top. The Velcro closures on the back and the bottom remained secure, even in the high winds. I decided to use a heavy duty trash bag as an “internal cover” since I don’t trust this cover anymore. I have also thought about using a silicone spray on the seams to help improve the water tightening. I do not store in direct sunlight and I do not fold when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike from MI

customer_reviews.title: Look For A Zipper Model
customer_reviews.text: It works as advertised. However, having to secure velcro at the bottom, back and corners was inconvenient and did not leave me feeling too comfortable about protecting the TV from moisture. I returned it and purchased a cover that has zippers on the bottom along with a soft interior designed to be more kind to your screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Stefani

customer_reviews.title: This TV cover is going to be awesome. We are going to use it to cover ...
customer_reviews.text: This TV cover is going to be awesome. We are going to use it to cover our TV in our camp trailer for the winter. It fits nicely. I recommend getting one for your TV. It does say outdoor cover, but it will work nicely for TVs that are not being used for long periods of time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Seaver

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described
customer_reviews.text: The product was supposed to have a scratch resistant interior but it is actually hard plastic that would be very abrasive to the screen. This is the 3rd cover I have ordered in the last week and all three have been incorrect as per the product description.. I ordered the same brand cover last September for my smaller outdoor TV and it does in fact have the scratch resistant interior. I simply went back and reordered a different size from the original order page and made 100% sure it stated that it had a scratch resistant interior. Very disappointed, this will be my 3rd trip in a week to the UPS store to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m super happy with my choice of this TV cover. Be sure and measure your actual TV size and not just the screen size to ensure your cover fits, I had to go up a size as my flat tv is older and has a fairly large frame around the screen (unlike newer TVs). I like how they used the Velcro to ensure it stays on and protecs from the elements. It appears to be of high quality and should last for many years. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: coolbreezesd

customer_reviews.title: Works, but not easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.text: I don’t actually know what I thought it would be like to use this on the tv on my coveted patio. It’s hard to tell from the pictures just how easy it would be to take the cover on and off. I have to say that’s probably the sticking point. It’s not easy to get on and off. I have to stand on a chair to take it on and off. But... having said that, I’d rather have it than not. It does protect the tv from moisture. I’ve not had any issue with it getting wet or anything. So, it does work. It just sucks taking it on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Miller

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on.  And too many velcro straps..
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cover and overall it's nice, but I had a different one before, for a 32" tv that was so easy to put on I guess I was spoiled. This cover tries to be a 'Universal' to fit any TV mounting bracket. But that makes it more complicated, and harder to put on. And my other cover had a 2" strap of velcro across the bottom, which made it very easy to close. This cover has many, many straps of 1/2" velcro, which makes it hard to get closed nicely. I'm looking at alternatives and may send this one back..
customer_reviews.author: Snacko

customer_reviews.title: Width is too big for newer flat TVs
customer_reviews.text: It’s shaped for a thicker flat screen TV, so there is a lot of sag and sway. Putting it on was a little tricky at first since the tv is hanging on the wall, it takes two people to put it on. The Velcro goes rouge and sticks to the fabric which is annoying but not really preventable. I gave it three stars because I wish the width fit a little more snug to the TV for extra coverage. I have only had it for a couple weeks so not sure if it has done its job yet.
customer_reviews.author: BPZ

customer_reviews.title: 46"-48" does not fit 46" LCD.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like an excellent cover and should do the trick. But I am going to have to return the 46"-48" version I bought for my 46" tv. It is too small and unable to close it up completely. Ordering the 50". So be sure to buy larger than the recommended size.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: Good price and high quality to cover for your patio!
customer_reviews.text: This case fit my tv perfectly! (40” with a thin bezel) I would highly recommend measuring the length of your tv and using the size chart to find the right fit for your tv. There is lots of velcro around all opening to make sure you can cover the tv from all sides. The back side openings are made to fit a single arm and double arm mount. The material is very thick and durable. I have no doubt this will stand up to the elements, but I wouldn’t use it to protect from direct rain. Not sure how water proof it would be. Cover comes on and off very easily. Overall very pleased with this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: We are using a normal flat screen mount with the 2 brackets and this cover fits around those nicely. It has a soft inside on the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits the new Hisense 50" TV we picked up from Costco for our covered deck perfectly. The TV is 44.4 inches wide and 24 tall. We are using a normal flat screen mount with the 2 brackets and this cover fits around those nicely. It has a soft inside on the screen side and a velcro encloser along the bottom. This will be perfect for keeping the dust and condensation off the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fadden

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: This does what it is supposed to do - protect your outdoor television from the elements. We keep one of our older TV's mounted on the deck outside. The TV it covers even survived the snow storm we just had here in the South.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not the Best but Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: The cover is well made, but it does not have any sort of padding on the front of the cover's interior that touches the TV screen. The inside is not quite as rough as the exterior but I can see where constant wind moving the cover could possibly scratch the front of the TV. Fortunately this goes on a TV in a pool cabana that is covered so it will not get the wind or water exposure that some might used otherwise. A bit snug on the 43 inch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Workd great on a 43 inch TV using a celing "pole" mount.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my 43 inch TCL TV. I used a ceiling "pole" style mount to hang the tv from the back porch ceiling. The cover has a great Velcro "cut out" to accommodate the mount, while still allowing for it to be sealed tight. The little remote pouch on the side was an u expected bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Ziemba

customer_reviews.title: covers the TV, but....
customer_reviews.text: While yes, this does cover the TV. The entire cover must be removed in order to watch TV. It's bulky and awkward to slide onto the tv. Wish there was a way to leave the cover on and simply roll up the front when we want to watch TV. We use it in our manufacturing warehouse. It keeps the dust off the TV, but it's really a pain to remove the cover when we need to see our live security footage while working
customer_reviews.author: S. Wollman

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed
customer_reviews.text: While this cover does fit my Samsung 70", the quality is very poor. There are loose strings everywhere, and some of the stitching is already coming apart on the back where it opens up around the mounting arm goes straight out of the packaging. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Not "Scratch-Proof", only scratch-resistant
customer_reviews.text: We did not like this TV cover because it's only "scratch-resistant", which was an oversight on my part. We wanted scratch-proof, something with a soft inner lining. The interior on this cover is okay, but it's not lined with anything soft. We did not try to cover our TV with it, so I don't know if it's easy to install. Other from that, it's definitely weatherproof and the overall quality appears to be very good.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and should work well
customer_reviews.text: The back opens up and has Velcro to allow you to cover TVs that have different types of mounts. The material is heavy duty and should work well to protect our outdoor TV from UV, pollen and moisture. Although the TV is under a roof the outdoor room is exposed to the elements and I wanted to keep the elements off the TV and this product is well made, and will work well. It actually looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: JED

customer_reviews.title: TV screen works fantastic
customer_reviews.text: screen cover works fantastic and protects the TV from rain....very lightweight and easy to take on and off
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Too big for a 49” led
customer_reviews.text: I have a 49” and the cover is way to big. The item is easy to put on and seals up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: K. Valen

customer_reviews.title: Weatherproof but fades quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit our new 49” outdoor tv very well, it’s a little loose but that’s not an issue. The only problem we’ve had is that it’s faded very very quickly. I know we have bright sun here in Texas but I thought it would at least last a few months. But it has done its job which is to keep our tv protected from the rain and wind. The Velcro fastenings in the back are easy to fit around the mount without compromising the security.
customer_reviews.author: lblong

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover for RV TV
customer_reviews.text: I use this cover for my outside RV television. The TV is under my awning, but during heavy rains, still needs protection and this cover does the trick. Nice velcro straps and the material appears to be of good quality. Make sure you check the sizing guidelines listed as all tvs are not the same. This size (37-39 ) fit my newer model 40" Insignia LED TV perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K9Nardu

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitching
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for my patio TV it looks great and flips on easily however the original one I ordered seemingly had defects with the stitching on the seams so I had it exchanged unfortunately the replacement one had exactly the same problem I would not recommend this product because the stitching apparently lacks quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostfibertech

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Great fir on our 39' insignia TV we put on our back porch. Easy to put on and completely envelops the TV. Recommend it if you need some weather protection for your outside TV
customer_reviews.author: Macon31210

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased with the great workmanship of this product
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the great workmanship of this product. Works great and looks great. Does a really good job of protecting the TV. From the elements etc. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Wish the TV I bought to cover worked as well!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great TV. Worked great on my outdoor TV that has a soundbar mounted underneath. Fits loose enough on the 55" that it goes all the way over the soundbar. Also a nice little holder for the remotes on the back. I have my TV mounted on a TV cart and this fits perfectly with that mount! Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: S. Porcher

customer_reviews.title: Not for double mount if you want waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: There is no way that this cover can be waterproof if you have a double mount The slits for the rails are too wide apart. Don't these manufacturers measure the TV's they expect to cover or just consult the standard dimensions of the most common TVs. If they get a lot of returns then they deserve to suffer the income loss.
customer_reviews.author: Marcpent

customer_reviews.title: Well made cover
customer_reviews.text: Order the cover for a new tv recently installed on my patio to protect it from moisture and dust.The day after I installed it go a rain storm with wind the wind blew the water beneath the patio cove so glad I had this it protected the 100% from the rain.Thanks for a great product 😀
customer_reviews.author: Lynn TX

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Read some reviews about mismatched sizing. Read the description carefully. Measure your TV carefully: the diagonal, the width and the length. Use the chart to decide which is best for your tv. I think it’s great! Easy to take on and off and water rolled off of the unit! Make sure you observe the placement of your tv and the weather it will be exposed to, to choose best cover option!
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo A.

customer_reviews.title: Better for 75” than 70” tv
customer_reviews.text: This is nice because it does have the cutouts on the back so it will fit around your tv mount. But this one would fit a 75” better than it does my 70”
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Tv cover review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tv cover a few weeks ago. It’s slightly weatherproof but still some rain got into the cover onto the tv which was a disappointment. Also it just barely fit the tv which made it difficult to put on or take off the tv. Not very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and Gary

customer_reviews.title: Deep enough the enclose the 5-1/2” legs on the bottom of my 32” TV.
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits my 32” TV perfectly. I measured the length and width of the set carefully before ordering. My set is 5-1/2” deep if you want to enclose the bottom legs. This was the only 32” cover that was 5-1/2” deep. Also, while in storage, the Velcro edged flap for wall bracket can contain the power supply and cords.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis B Nevada

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great! Easy to take off/put back on
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you measure and get the right size. Liked this one because you can split the entire back easily and just lift off the TV. Great - as long as your TV is at a height where that makes sense. Also - because it lifts off - the only openings are the back and bottom which are well sealed by Velcro
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit for the 43 in LG TV
customer_reviews.text: I love this flexibility it gives for us to cover/uncover as needed for our outdoor sitting area. The ONLY downside are the multiple velcro openings that make it challenging to get OVER the TV, and fitted around the wall bracket. But overall, we have been very pleased with the protection and durability it is offering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Kolife does a great job giving you enough information the find a cover that fits your TV, especially when diagonal screen size is NOT the best measurement to go by... Material appears to be a high quality, fits well, and closes securely. Strong recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: VERY WELL MADE
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. We covered our outdoor TV which is exposed to some direct sunlight throughout the day and to rain. We used the cover for roughly 5 months so far, never had a problem with the cover leaking nor has it faded or show any kind of wear from the weather. The fit was perfect and the Velcro in the back lines up exactly in the right places making it easy to close up. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Nunnery

customer_reviews.title: Not easy access to remove cover!
customer_reviews.text: The cover does not come off easy! You think there would be velcro on both sides so you could role it up, however there isn't. You need to almost take it completely off which is s pain when again house. Also I could see daylight holes before I even installed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: really flimsy has no body whatsoever
customer_reviews.text: Cover is incredibly flimsy and poorly designed. The velcro to close the bottom flap is mounted on the inside of the cover so it is all but impossible to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: Order based on Measurement of TV, Not Screen Size
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews, I ordered this cover based on the actual width of the TV, not the screen size. Fits like a glove. This is the 46-48 inch TV cover and I installed it on a 50" TV. Do not have any of the sagging or hanging off that others were experiencing. Be sure to measure the width of your TV and order based on that measurement. You will greatly satisfied with this product as I am.
customer_reviews.author: JIll - Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product & Price
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to put on and take off. I have an LED TV in my garage where it is dusty and this works great. Love it. Would recommend. The material quality is better then expected and heavier then i expected.
customer_reviews.author: Judd Mudd

customer_reviews.title: economical, fits 70" tv perfectly, appears to provide good protection
customer_reviews.text: It was economical and easy to install by myself. The only thing I don't love is the emote control pocket does not accommodate a standard Samsung remote plus a Roku or Amazon remote.
customer_reviews.author: Carolr424

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Fits over our Vizio 32" smart tv perfectly. Our TV is under a gazebo so doesn't get direct rain. This cover is easy to slip over tv, has a nice pocket in the back for a couple of remotes.
customer_reviews.author: Hattie2

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit a 42” tv simple as that , their are holes on the back that don’t even close all the way up. Tv got wet from that pretty sure it’s ruined. And it will not Velcro at the bottom To small ! And yes it’s a 42” tv
customer_reviews.author: benjami daurio

customer_reviews.title: Water proof
customer_reviews.text: We installed a tv on patio and bought this cover and couldn't be happier. This is not cheap light weight material it is well made and has a pocket for the remote. It is made for mounting bracket or stand alone. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: steve d.

customer_reviews.title: High quality material
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect tv cover, goes on very easy and covers great. We also have a shelf under tv for cable box and covers that as well. We live on the gulf water and it protects our tv great from the salt water. Highly recommended this tv cover. High quality material. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and Durable product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased in order to cover my new patio TV (not and outdoor TV) and the first weekend we have it up we had more than 1" of rain. Not a drop got inside to the TV. The Velcro is very strong on this product and helps seal the product around the TV very well. So far, very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kind87

customer_reviews.title: Good value for great product so far.
customer_reviews.text: We live in coastal Alabama so weather varies temp wise, but is generally very humid. We also get a lot of rain, and it has been protected. (Our tv is under a covered patio but wind blows rain all directions here.) The tv has done very well under this cover, and it is easy to get on/off.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product at a very good price point. I was a little concerned when I ordered this TV cover because prices varied greatly for different manufacturers and this was one of the least expensive. It ended up being perfect and very well made. The fit was spot on and easy to install. I’m using it on my back patio and the pocket for the remote is awesome. You cannot go wrong buying this cover.
customer_reviews.author: R. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!! Excellent tv cover!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tv cover!! Fits like a glove over my 43 inch tv. Velcro straps on the back and under the tv for weather protection all the way around. The tv remote pocket on the back is great. Great buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge A. Fierro

customer_reviews.title: Probably water resistant
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t call the interior “scratch resistant” it’s just rubber backed. Fits my tv well. My tv is very thin, and this could fit a very wide television. Serves it’s purpose. I wouldn’t use this and rely on it being “waterproof”. My tv is well under a covered patio, just got it for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Smith

customer_reviews.title: Much too long for TV even though measured diagonally, ...
customer_reviews.text: Much too long for TV even though measured diagonally, hangs too low difficult to close properly, back doesn’t seem to close properly
customer_reviews.author: Dominick J. Ginex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product provides perfect protection from the elements. Our TV sits out on the covered portion of our lanai but was still subject to wind-driven rain. The TV will stay dry! The cover fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellently
customer_reviews.text: Great item we have here with this tv cover, my only issue is that I can’t see the tv picture when I have the cover on, but the sound comes in crystal clear. Yay for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmjamz3889

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!!
customer_reviews.text: We found the cover to be well made with a variety of Velcro openings to allow adjustments for several cord options, etc. I have not had a cover that actually had Velcro across the bottom as well, giving complete coverage. The remote pocket is large enough for several remotes and/or controllers. I have recently put it up, but the material is heavy enough that I expect it to last for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve R. Slane

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Material and fits as specified to TV size range. Definitely will buy one for myself. i Bought this for my in laws TV they installed outside under patio
customer_reviews.author: Charlos

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The material is solid. Dust, wind, or rain shouldn’t be an issue. I bought mine bigger due to mounting my directv receiver under it and will add a sound bar. It goes over nicely and the Velcro is easy to access. Price was low and delivery was fast. Couldn’t ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Genaro Cano

customer_reviews.title: Works for us
customer_reviews.text: It works for us. No rain seems to get in. However the bottom isn’t real secure so i guess water could get in from the bottom. It serves its purpose for us!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Alexander

customer_reviews.title: What a great product
customer_reviews.text: This cover protects our out door patio TV perfectly. We've had a couple of good showers and this cover did what it was advertised to do. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rick I

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: We love this cover. It does exactly as it claims. We like the pouch on the back that holds the remote. A great purchase for us for our back porch.
customer_reviews.author: Banditgirl222

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I was worried about it not fitting the back brackets of my tv stand. But everything fits over tv and brackets perfect.
customer_reviews.author: graff

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to put on and protects my outdoor TV. I can sleep with ease knowing that during a heavy rainstorm my TV is protected. Also I love that it has a pocket to keep the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Moore

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for in a cover.
customer_reviews.text: Great cover for my screened in porch. Fits around the wall bracket and TV very well. I chose this cover because I believe it will be more waterproof than the ones with the roll-up front cover. Working great so far and I like the pocket for the remote.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to wait for a real test for the cover and we recently had a tropical storm and the cover worked great! Tv still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Fits easily over the TV and around the mount from the ceiling. Have not tested weather proof, as San Diego does not get much weather except sun.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Morehouse

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor tv cover
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with this purchase. I will let weather happen here in Arizona to give a better weatherproof review. Other then that. Easy to put the cover on it just slips on and the velcro to enclose the tv in. Hope the video and photos helps with questions about this product. Will I recommend...Yes, I will recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Velcro already coming apart after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: It works well- does great to protect from rain and we’ve had some pretty heavy rain days- however we’ve only had it like 2 months and the Velcro on the back is already coming apart - I was hoping it would atleast last a year.
customer_reviews.author: grace

customer_reviews.title: I was very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It Faded colors from the sun... I was very Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carl M.

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to their measuring guidelines and you'll have no issues. Ours fit our TV just fine and there's nothing about the product quality that makes me think that we'll have any issues down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great for patio
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok a little loose but not exact size I would buy again good adjustable Velcro back for your different mounts
customer_reviews.author: Tigger10

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My TV that's outside is a 39" flatscreen which is the top end of this size of cover. It fits snug and it has been through two pretty severe thunderstorms and has protected the TV without a problem. It's good quality and made of thick, durable material. I highly recommend this for your outside TV!
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Green

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Product came as advertised. Very easy to use with a ceiling TV mount and the remote controller pocket is a nice touch. The cover was able to withstand a few really bad rain and wind storms and kept my TV and wires dry. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV cover
customer_reviews.text: This cover was exactly what I was looking for. It is a heavy material and very well constructed. It goes on quickly and easily. Protects my tv from the elements. I would definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzomac

customer_reviews.title: Great TV Cover
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Fits our 24"flat screen TV perfect , secures well & has a nice pocket for the remote. Our TV is outdoors & it has protected it well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: good cover
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality cover although it is my first one I could not imagine there being one better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Royce H

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, just right around my 22" patio TV. Super easy to install. It's like a slip cover or sandwich baggie (just not as loud or look of plastic) over the TV. More cloth-like. It's been great when we're not outside enjoying the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Silva

customer_reviews.title: Seems durable and long-lasting.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put on, had extra room if you needed it. Velcro fit snugly. Remote pouch at the back was handy. It's being used on a covered patio and so far it has held up just fine. We also liked the idea of the lining to protect the tv screen and it seems to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits The Bill
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Looks very professional, durable material, waterproof & it fits perfectly. Really like the included remote control pocket, being outside this is really a handy built in feature. Can't beat the price. Very happy in St. Louis!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John P. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: The product seems well made and thick. I don't use it outdoors so I don't know if it will hold up in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It works,
customer_reviews.text: I keep it outside under a pergola where it can still get some rain or moisture depending on the type of storm and weather. This helps a ton and have had for a year or so
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The size of the cover is not as advertised. It is actually much smaller and does not fit the TV within the size indicated on the package
customer_reviews.author: charlene christie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for 7 months now and it’s holding up great in our gazebo protecting our tv and fire stick through the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gil

customer_reviews.title: Great product for what it is used for.
customer_reviews.text: Used on television in the rooms at church to protect them. Does an excellent job. Have not used them outdoor and have not tested their ability to repel water.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bardon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Only had it for a couple of weeks but very good. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: High quality and very functional.....
customer_reviews.text: We just mounted a TV on a covered porch. Thought this would care for our investment. Fits the TV perfectly — great quality fabric and easy to install and remove as needed.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Fasting shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit,order the exact size of TV.Next time I order couple inches large.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia  A. Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Fit for my 40" Vizo tv. Snug and great protection from dusty El Paso Tx. Summer dust storms.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an outdoor dart board that we have & it works perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: tracie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor tv
customer_reviews.text: This cover is perfect for our outdoor tv!! It is also in a box, but I didnt feel that was enough. This cover is great quality and I know our tv is protected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to install. Reasonably durable. I'm happy with it. If I need another, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bichon

customer_reviews.title: Covers entire 75"TV
customer_reviews.text: Cover is rugged material and completely encloses TV. it is a tight fit, you have to pull over both sides, which is hard on a 75" TV, gotta have a big wing span but that is the only thing thats a little tough, but does not flop in the wind. like the remote pouch on the back.
customer_reviews.author: SJ23

customer_reviews.title: Good Protection
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the tv dust free even in the shop. Easy to remove and install is seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The cover fit perfectly and totally protects the TV. Well made and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Tv cover
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my outside tv on my RV and has been in some direct rain. So far it has worked as it should and has not let moisture in that I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with this cover. The top seam already unstitched and I've only had it almost 2 months. My TV is under soffits which help keep the weather off it so it has not seen any extreme sun or rain. I just noticed the stitches undone and a hole and I'm just of return or refund window. Great.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Warblow

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job protecting my outdoor TV. Very well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: A bit large for our tv but we have made it work. Great quality material. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for our outside TV when we go camping. It worked great. Easy on easy off. I even like the pouch on the back where I can stash the remote control or miscellaneous cables.
customer_reviews.author: JARandell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on and off, keeps tv dry in rain.
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put on and off, fits true to size. Velcro connections are easy to close and open. Has rained on my tv several times and it kept it dry with no issues. I’d recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C.

product_meta.title: Outdoor TV Cover 40 to 43 inches, Bottom Seal, Waterproof and Weatherproof, Fits Up to 39.5W x 25H inches
product_meta.description:
Size:40'' - 43''| Color:BlackDon’t forget to measure your TV. Choose a suitable cover for your TV according to the guide blow. 

Size Width Height 
24’’ 23’’ 17’’

Kolife Heavy duty outdoor TV cover - Weatherproof Universal Protector for 40'' - 43" LCD, LED, Plasma Television Sets, Get your hands on it, you will get the best protection for your outdoor television! 

Why Choose the outdoor TV cover by Kolife? 
-Scratch resistant soft interior and new design of bottom seal
-Fit most mounts and stands
-Durable weatherproof and waterproof material
-Waterproof remote controller storage pocket
-Double stitched edges to ensure maximum strength
-360 degrees protection,extend the life of outdoor TV
feature_bullets: SIZE FIT - 39.5" W x 25" H x 5.5" D - Compatible with modern 40'' - 43'' LCD, LED, Plasma TV of most brand, Fit most wall/ceiling mount and stands.Be sure to MEASURE YOUR TV FIRST to determine the proper cover size.Also you can use it as a monitor cover.
SCRATCH RESISTANT & BOTTOM SEAL - Soft interior prevents TV screen from scraping. Double Stitched for maximum strength, provides the best protection for your outdoor television.
HIGH QUALITY AND PREMIUM MATERIAL - Protect your TV from the harsh elements, whether it be Wind, Rain, Snow, Dust, etc. Provide 360 degrees protection and extend the life of your outdoor TV.
EASY TO SET UP - High quality industrial Velcro straps are used to fasten in your TV. The REMOTE CONTROL POCKET facilitate storage of your remote control.
